item.title: About
item.description: My name is Ezequiel, but you already know that because of my nick :) Here Iâ€™m going to publish every research that I do in my free time about information security, especially offensive security. What do you do? I am a Security Researcher, my everyday job is looking for security bugs in applications and networks. For a few years, I also worked as a Full Stack developer, so the Code is my friend too.
